title: 如何汉化进不去服的提示
author: qq2415786013
txt_content: You are already connected to this proxy  如何汉化这段话   有没有大佬知道！

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
好吧，能改。

打开 bc 的核心，然后编辑 messages.properties 文件就行了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 这是 bungeecord 的提示吧，好像不能在配置文件中改

replies.txt_content:
